definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The standard American edition of the Revised Version appeared in 1901.
sentences.chinese: 1901年標準美國版本的《修訂本聖經》正式發行。

sentences.english: He asked to see the amended version.
This revised edition has corrected several obvious mistakes in the previous editions.
sentences.chinese: 這個修訂本糾正了以前版本的幾個明顯的錯誤。

sentences.english: This revised edition is incomparable with the earlier ones.
sentences.chinese: 這一修訂本不可與先前的版本同日而語。

sentences.english: She did some revision for the exam.
sentences.chinese: 那書的修訂本即將出版。

sentences.english: Copy of scope of supply and amendments.
sentences.chinese: 供應範圍和修訂本的副本。

sentences.english: The history of Chinese landscape painting.
The Governor may by order published in the Gazette amend any Schedule to this Ordinance.
sentences.chinese: 總督可借憲報命令修訂本條例任何附表。

sentences.english: I have got the revision of his dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我得到了他編的詞典的修訂本。
